post:
**Let's kick off Black Friday vps madness ;-)**

35% off all OpenVZ plans worldwide incl. Liechtenstein
35% off all KVM  plans worldwide incl. Israel (Tel Aviv) and Liechtenstein

ORDER YOUR KVM and OpenVZ plans here =>[ https://manage.edis.at/whmcs/cart.php?systpl=portal&language=English&promocode=BLKFRIWEEK35]( https://manage.edis.at/whmcs/cart.php?systpl=portal&language=English&promocode=BLKFRIWEEK35)

BTW: we also have a small Black Friday offer for Waveride plans: Use Waveride coupon-code BLKFRIWAVEK20 to claim a recurring 20% lifetime discount on any new Waveride OpenVZ plan. [https://waveride.at/plans](https://waveride.at/plans)
 
EDIS and Waveride coupon-codes are **valid until Cyber-Monday (01/12/2014)**

KVM locations and looking-glass incl. Test-IPv4 / IPv6, testfiles to measure download-speeds, ...

Cheers,
Gerhard @EDIS
